inlineContent.text: Designed to ensure data protection, the SDK securely stores and encrypts user credentials, enforces access control through managed permissions, and provides personalized services based on securely stored credentials.
Authentication is required to access any functionality within the TruVideo SDK
, supporting a safe and reliable user experience.

abstract.text: provides essential tools for secure authentication, session management, and utility operations, tailored specifically for video-centric applications on iOS. With this SDK, developers can seamlessly integrate TruVideoâ€™s platform, enabling efficient workflows for video recording, streaming, and data management while maintaining strict security and privacy standards.
